title: Better Pseudodistributions and Derandomization for Space-Bounded Computation
where-published-summary: ToC (special issue for RANDOM 2021, to appear)
timeline: I posted a manuscript online in March 2021; I presented the paper at RANDOM in August 2021; the full version of the paper will appear in the Theory of Computing special issue for RANDOM 2021.
version-notes: The RANDOM proceedings version and the ECCC version are the same except for minor, superficial differences.
recognition: Oded Goldreich discusses the paper in this blog post.
